text: RK Sloboda is a team handball club based in Tuzla, Bosnia and Herzegovina. It is part of the RSD Sloboda Tuzla. It plays its home games in Mejdan, Tuzla. The clubs greatest success are three Bosnian Championship titles .http://sportsport.ba/rukomet/sloboda-u-nizi-rang-povukla-gradacac/189406 == History == Club was founded in 1959 as charter of Sloboda Sports Society. Since its foundation the club's sponsor has been the local salt factory called Solana. Club has played first international match since Bosnia and Herzegovina has gained independence.http://www.ehfcl.com/men/1996-97/match/0/007/Steaua+Bukarest+-+RK+Sloboda+Solana In season 2016/2017 the club competed in League of Federation of Bosnia and Herzegovina following relegation from Handball Championship of Bosnia and Herzegovina in season 2015/2016. == Honours == === Domestic competitions === ====League==== *Handball Championship of Bosnia and Herzegovina: **16px Winners (3): 1994, 1995, 1996 *First League of Federation of Bosnia and Herzegovina - North: **16px Winners (1): 2018 ====Cups==== *Handball Cup of Bosnia and Herzegovina: **16px Winners (3): 1994, 1996, 2020http://www.federalna.ba/bhs/vijest/334760 ==Recent seasons== The recent season-by-season performance of the club: sportdc.net, accessed: 20 October 2020 {| class="wikitable" |- align="center" bgcolor="#dfdfdf" | Season | Division | Tier | Position |- align="center" | 2014-15 | align="left"| Premier League | rowspan=2| I | 10th |- align="center" | 2015-16 | align="left"| Premier League | bgcolor="#ffcccc"| 15th ↓ |- align="center" | 2017-18 | align="left"| First League FBiH -
